notes: Phase 1 non-logo assets: SVG icon set, trust badges, dividers, subtle backgrounds, and portal empty-state illustrations (no people). All icons use currentColor for easy CSS theming.

folders.badges/svg: Trust badges (320x96) for homepage cards or footer strip.
folders.dividers/svg: Section wave dividers for page breaks.
folders.portal/empty_states: Custom illustrations for Ops/Employee/Docs/Dispatch empty states in PNG+WEBP.

recommended_sizes.badges: 320x96 or scale down proportionally; keep min height 48px.
recommended_sizes.backgrounds: Prefer WEBP; fall back to PNG.
recommended_sizes.empty_states: Use 1200x675 for cards/modals; 1600x900 for full sections.
